key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and reliance on critical materials
Integration risks post-merger with II-VI Incorporated, including cultural alignment and operational efficiency
Regulatory and trade tensions, particularly between the U.S. and China
Competitive pressure in a rapidly evolving industry requiring continuous R&D investment
Legal and ethical concerns from employment discrimination lawsuits
controversies: Employment discrimination lawsuit (Coder v. Coherent Corporation)
Potential legal disputes from supply chain nonperformance due to COVID-19 disruptions
environmental_issues: Significant reliance on renewable energy sources, with 78% of global electricity needs met by renewables
social_issues: Employment discrimination lawsuit raising reputational and legal risks
Implementation of ethical supply chain practices to prohibit child and forced labor
governance_issues: Integration challenges post-merger impacting operational efficiency and customer retention
Regulatory challenges in global operations, particularly in Asia-Pacific
